title: 820-02016 not turn on
message: I don't know how this type of board works, can you help me with the measures to take; only 5v 20ma en tester

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message:
Did you try DFU?
Any history available?

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message: THE ONLY WAY TO DFU, IS WITH ANOTHER LAPTOP M1 CONNECT IT? client said that it discharged the battery and it did not turn on again

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message:
You can do it even with older USB 3 model, using correct cable.
Original Apple Tunderbolt 3 cable, using another USB-C MacBook (2016, or newer), is the recommended way.

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message: I already tried dfu problem persists

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message:
any story? previous technician reballed the 2 cd3217
a question I have cd3215 other logic board macbook air 2018 retina,  it is compatible with logic board 2020 CD3217?
where buy cd3217?

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message:
Just look at schematics to understand not compatible chips.
If no donor board available, try Aliexpress; pray hard in such case.

Maybe not worth to invest time in this machine, if someone else already worked on it.

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message: change cd3217 and the equipment turned on, but it does not recognize the battery, an x appears, will it be a battery problem or a chip change, I do not have batteries for this model to check, any specific test o measure?

title: 820-02016 not turn on
message:
Check diode mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Known good working battery may be the only way to discard battery issue.
